text: Alexander Kuzmich Vustin, also Voustin or Wustin (, 24 April 1943 - 19 April 2020) was a Russian composer. His best known opera was The Devil in Love. His career began in 1962. He also worked for the BBC Symphony Orchestra. Vustin died on 19 April 2020 from pneumonia, aged 76.От пневмонии умер композитор Александр Вустин, rg.ru ==References== ==Other websites== *About the opera Boosey & Hawkes *Vustin's works from Boosey & Hawkes Category:1943 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from pneumonia Category:Russian composers
title: Alexander Vustin
